about.title: The Riparian Challenge
about.description: Riparian zones are critical ecological buffers but are increasingly threatened by erosion, runoff, and climate variability.
about.problemDesc: Current monitoring methods are insufficient to address the scale of degradation. There is an urgent need for a scalable, automated, and intelligent system that continuously monitors riparian health and supports adaptive restoration.
about.problem3: Lack of predictive and simulation capabilities
about.quote: Restoring the lifelines of our planet through data-driven precision.

techstack.description: Our multimodal sensor-LiDAR platform enables early, precise detection of riparian environmental changes. By combining physical sensing with generative models, we create a living digital twin of the ecosystem.
techstack.feature1Desc: Stationary, IoT-connected LiDAR sensors provide precise, real-time environmental mapping and anomaly detection.
techstack.feature2Desc: AI models analyze soil and climate data to recommend optimal native vegetation for replanting efforts.
techstack.feature3Desc: Localized micro-climate forecasting helps predict runoff and manage water levels effectively.
techstack.feature4Desc: Continuous learning systems that adapt restoration strategies based on real-time feedback loops.
